meaningMnemonic: You know that this has something to do with <kanji>read</kanji>ing and you know that 方 means <kanji>way</kanji> or <kanji>method</kanji>. So, when you think of a "way of reading" you can think of a couple other better words, such as <vocabulary>reading</vocabulary> (aka the reading of a word) or <vocabulary>pronunciation</vocabulary>. Anytime you need to know how something sounds, this is what you'll ask for.
readingMnemonic: This uses the kun'yomi readings from the vocab words 読む and 方. So as long as you're okay with those, you can apply that knowledge over here.
